text: Luigi Lonfernini (born August 31, 1938) is a Sammarinese politician. He was Captain Regent of San Marino in 1971 and 2001.CNN Election Watch for 2001 He is also a lawyer and banker. He was a member of the Sammarinese Christian Democratic Party. He was the Secretary for Finance from 1972 to 1973. ==References== Category:Captains Regent of San Marino Category:European lawyers Category:Bankers Category:Living people Category:1938 births
title: Luigi Lonfernini
